not_configured_yet: Dongosolo silinakonzedwe panobe. Wizard yokhazikitsira iyi ikuthandizani kuti mukhazikitse dongosolo lanu ndikuyenda pang'onopang'ono.
system_config_start_with_base_and_backup: Bwezerani kuchokera ku fayilo yosunga zobwezeretsera
system_config_include_demo: Phatikizani chiwonetsero chokhala ndi zida zoyeserera
cronwizard_bindings_define_types_and_mod: Fotokozani mitundu ndi ma module omwe ali pansi pa ndondomekoyi (posankha)
cronwizard_action_schedule_variable_hint: Gwiritsani ntchito @ {{name}} monga kusintha kwa mawu a cron kapena gwiritsani ntchito Scheduler.IsScheduling("@ {{name}}") m'mapulogalamu odzipangira okha kuti muwonetsetse chochitikachi.
main_code_empty_note: Khodi "Yaikulu" ilibe kanthu. Gwiritsani ntchito mkonzi wa "Visual code" kuti mupange code iyi: - Tsegulani gulu la "Pulogalamu" kuchokera pamndandanda wamalamulo kumanzere - Kokani chipika chamtundu wa "Main" mu malo ogwirira ntchito - Onjezani mkati mwake ma code ena kuti mugwiritse ntchito ndi malingaliro a pulogalamuyi.
setup_code_empty_note: Khodi ya "kukhazikitsa" ilibe kanthu. Gwiritsani ntchito mkonzi wa "Visual code" kuti mupange code iyi: - Tsegulani gulu la "Program" kuchokera pamawu olamula kumanzere - Kokani chipika chamtundu wa "Setup" mu malo ogwirira ntchito - Onjezani mkati mwake ma code ena kuti mudziwe zomwe zingayambitse "Main" kukhazikitsa kachidindo Code iyi imawunikiridwa nthawi iliyonse chochitika chatsopano chichitika komanso kamodzi pa mphindi imodzi.
capture_commands_description: Onjezani malamulo onse opangidwa pamanja pa ma widget ku pulogalamuyi.

16.Title: Memory Level
16.Description: Sungani ndikukumbukira mulingo womaliza wa dimmer.

26.Title: Magetsi amtundu
26.Description: Chitsanzo cha kuyatsa kwa Philips Hue pogwiritsa ntchito HTTP API (V1). Wosakhazikika woti alumikizane ndi mlatho ndi "wopanga zatsopano" ndipo uyenera kukhala woyatsidwa kale.

34.Title: Weather Forecast
34.Description: Zanyengo ndi zolosera zochokera ku ntchito ya Open Weather Map. Kuti mutsegule widget iyi lowetsani kiyi yolondola ya API. Tsatirani malangizo pa https://openweathermap.org/appid kuti mupeze kiyi yaulere ya API.

77.Title: Mtengo MQTT
77.Description: Lumikizani kwa broker wa MQTT kuti mugwiritse ntchito pulogalamu ya HomeGenie Panel kulikonse kudzera pa intaneti kapena kulumikiza zida za HomeGenie pa netiweki yomweyo ya MQTT.
77.MQTT.SensorPublish: Sindikizani zochitika zomwe zatulutsidwa ndi gawoli

78.Title: Smart Thermostat
78.Description: Gwiritsani ntchito sensa iliyonse ya kutentha ndi kusintha kwanzeru kuti mugwiritse ntchito mawonekedwe a thermostat.

81.Title: Mphamvu Monitor
81.Description: Pangani ziwerengero pakugwiritsa ntchito mphamvu ndikugwiritsa ntchito zida.

82.Title: Njira Yopulumutsira Mphamvu
82.Description: Sungani mulingo wa kuwala pansi pa kuchuluka kosinthika.

88.Title: generic IP kamera
88.Description: Onetsani / mayendedwe azithunzi kuchokera ku kamera ya IP.
88.IpCamera.ImageURL: Ulalo wa chithunzi cha kamera (onani zolemba za kamera yanu)

90.Title: Security Alamu System
90.Description: Gwiritsani ntchito masensa ndi zida zina kukhazikitsa ma alarm system.
90.ConfigureOptions.Email.Recipients: Mndandanda wolekanitsidwa wa koma wa olandira maimelo a zidziwitso zama alarm
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.ArmedProgram: Pulogalamu yoyendetsa pamene muli ndi zida

111.Title: Kusintha kwa kasitomala
111.Description: Imakhazikitsa API yoyang'anira ma profailo a kasitomala omwe amagwiritsidwa ntchito kusunga UI ndi ma dashboards.

400.Title: Chiwonetsero cha Virtual Modules
400.Description: Khazikitsani pamanja makonda a chipangizo chowona.

401.Title: Chiwonetsero - Toggle Door
401.Description: Imatengera chitseko chotseguka / chotsekedwa cha sensor yazenera lazenera.

402.Title: Chiwonetsero - Zoyenda Zapezeka
402.Description: Imatsanzira kuzindikira koyenda kwa ma sensa ambiri.

505.Title: Kuwongolera Kwakutali
505.Description: Yang'anirani chipangizocho pogwiritsa ntchito chakutali (IR kapena RF).

142.Title: Akaunti ya imelo
142.Description: Imasunga zidziwitso zamaakaunti a imelo omwe amagwiritsidwa ntchito ndi mapulogalamu otumizira/kulandira maimelo.
142.ConfigureOptions.Email.SmtpUseSsl: 6. Seva ya SMTP imagwiritsa ntchito SSL

145.Title: Smart Chipangizo
145.Description: Yatsani/zimitsani chipangizochi potengera kuzindikira koyenda komanso kuwala kozungulira.

8.Title: Mtundu wa Sunrise Colours
8.Description: Chitsanzo "Kutuluka kwa Dzuwa" pakusintha mitundu ya nyali za LED.
8.Scenarios.SunriseColors: Lumikizani ku zochitika za Sunrise Colors

910.Title: Kuzindikira kwa chinthu
910.Description: Dziwani zinthu pogwiritsa ntchito mtundu wa YOLO11 wophunzitsidwa kale.
910.ML.ObjectDetection.TriggerDetect: Mndandanda wazinthu zosiyanitsidwa ndi koma (mu Chingerezi) zomwe zingayambitse alamu. (monga: mphaka, galu, munthu, chikwama, sutikesi)
910.ConfigureOptions.Yolo.ModelPath: Njira ya fayilo yachitsanzo ya YOLO11 (.onnx)

911.Title: Kuyerekeza
911.Description: Kuzindikira mfundo zazikuluzikulu pogwiritsa ntchito kuyerekezera kwazithunzi, pogwiritsa ntchito mitundu ya ONNX yokhazikika kapena mtundu wa YOLOv11 wophunzitsidwa kale (mawonekedwe amunthu).
911.ConfigureOptions.Yolo.ModelPath: Njira ya fayilo yachitsanzo ya YOLO11 (.onnx)
